metadata.title: CVE-2014-10402 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the DBI module through 1.643 for Perl. DBD::Filedrivers can open files from folders other than those specifically passedvia the f_dir attribute in the data source name (DSN). NOTE: this issueexists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-10401.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
